languages.text: {n}Кибелла едва слышно шепчет:{/n} "Много людей, внимание Домин, первое посещение дворца... Они нервничают. Нужно дать этим людям время. Дать привыкнуть к обстановке, к... твоему присутствию. Пусть разойдутся по зале, отведают яств. Мы поговорим с каждым отдельно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла едва слышно шепчет:{/n} "Много людей, внимание Эним, первое посещение дворца... Они нервничают. Нужно дать этим людям время. Позволить привыкнуть к обстановке, привыкнуть к нам. Пусть расслабятся, разойдутся по зале, отведают яств. Мы поговорим с каждым из них отдельно".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла едва слышно шепчет:{/n} "Много людей, внимание Домин, первое посещение дворца... Они нервничают. Нужно дать этим людям время. Дать привыкнуть к обстановке, к... твоему присутствию. Пусть разойдутся по зале, отведают яств. Мы поговорим с каждым отдельно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Barely audibly, Kibellah whispers,{/n} "A lot of people, the Enim's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get used to the surroundings and to... your presence. Let them spread out around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

Let them get used to the surroundings and to... your presence. Let them spread out around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

Let them get accustomed to these surroundings and to... your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

Let them get accustomed to these surroundings and to... your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

languages.text: {n}Le murmure de Kibellah est à peine audible :{/n} « Si l'on rajoute à toute cette foule le fait qu'ils se trouvent au centre de l'attention {mf|du|de la} Domin et que c'est la première fois qu'ils se rendent dans le palais... Ils sont nerveux. Vous devez leur laisser le temps de s'habituer à ce nouvel environnement... et à votre présence. Qu'ils profitent des lieux et du festin. Nous irons ensuite leur parler à chacun individuellement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le murmure de Kibellah est à peine audible :{/n} « Si l'on rajoute à toute cette foule le fait qu'ils se trouvent au centre de l'attention {mf|du|de la} Domin et que c'est la première fois qu'ils se rendent dans le palais... Ils sont nerveux. Vous devez leur laisser le temps de s'habituer à ce nouvel environnement... et à votre présence. Qu'ils profitent des lieux et du festin. Nous irons ensuite leur parler à chacun individuellement. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah susurra de forma casi inaudible:{/n} «Entre el gentío, la atención de su Domin y el ser su primera visita al palacio... están nerviosos. Deles tiempo. Deje que se acostumbren al lugar... y a su presencia. Que recorran la sala y degusten la comida. Podremos hablar con ellos por separado».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah susurra de forma casi inaudible:{/n} «Entre el gentío, la atención de su Domin y el ser su primera visita al palacio... están nerviosos. Deles tiempo. Deje que se acostumbren al lugar... y a su presencia. Que recorran la sala y degusten la comida. Podremos hablar con ellos por separado».

languages.text: {n}キベラは、わずかに聞き取れる程度の声量でささやく。{/n}「集まった人々にドミンの視線、そして初めての宮殿訪問…彼らは緊張しているわ。時間をあげた方がいい。この状況と…あなたという存在に慣れてもらうの。ホールを見てもらって、食べ物をつまんでもらうといいわ。後から1人ずつ個別に話をしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、わずかに聞き取れる程度の声量でささやく。{/n}「集まった人々にドミンの視線、そして初めての宮殿訪問…彼らは緊張しているわ。時間をあげた方がいい。この状況と…あなたという存在に慣れてもらうの。ホールを見てもらって、食べ物をつまんでもらうといいわ。後から1人ずつ個別に話をしましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈以你几乎听不到的声音开了口。{/n}“第一次访问宫殿，这么多人在场，还得到了秘者本人的注意……他们非常紧张。你得给他们些时间，让他们慢慢习惯这里的环境……以及你的存在。让他们在大厅里闲逛，品尝美食吧，我们可以和他们每个人单独聊聊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈以你几乎听不到的声音开了口。{/n}“第一次访问宫殿，这么多人在场，还得到了秘者本人的注意……他们非常紧张。你得给他们些时间，让他们慢慢习惯这里的环境……以及你的存在。让他们在大厅里闲逛，品尝美食吧，我们可以和他们每个人单独聊聊。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah flüstert kaum hörbar:{/n} "Viele Leute, die Aufmerksamkeit {mf|des Domin|der Domin} und ihr erster Besuch im Palast ... Sie sind nervös. Ihr müsst diesen Leuten Zeit geben. Lasst sie sich an die Umgebung gewöhnen ... und an Eure Anwesenheit. Lasst sie durch die Halle flanieren und das Essen probieren. Wir werden uns einzeln mit ihnen unterhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah flüstert kaum hörbar:{/n} "Viele Leute, die Aufmerksamkeit des Domin und ihr erster Besuch im Palast ... Sie sind nervös. Ihr müsst diesen Leuten Zeit geben. Lasst sie sich an die Umgebung gewöhnen ... und an Eure Anwesenheit. Lasst sie durch die Hale flanieren und das Essen probieren. Wir werden uns einzeln mit ihnen unterhalten."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, güç bela duyulan bir sesle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Kalabalık, Domin'in ilgisi ve bunun saraya ilk ziyaretleri olması... Gerginler. Bu insanlara zaman tanımalısın. Etraflarını çeviren ortama ve... Senin varlığına aşina olmalarına müsaade et. Bırak salonda gezinip yemeklerin tadına baksınlar. Eninde sonunda her biriyle konuşacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah whispers, just barely audibly,{/n} "A crowd, the Domin's attention, and this being their first visit to the palace... They are nervous. You must give these people time. Let them get accustomed to these surroundings... and to your presence. Let them wander around the hall and taste the food. We will talk to each one individually."
